entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Belleville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:20 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 9:00 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: -0.3°C
Wind: W 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle this evening and after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 8:43 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:43 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
